title: Boonsom Farm Store
description: Moved to this location Dec 2013. Boonsom is a producer of spirulina since early 1990s in Mae Wang village, a nature center with the Mae Win river and elephant camps 7km west of the farm. Visitors are invited to view a short video history of the farm and the 7 production steps of spirulina as well as purchase spirulina products. Boonsom also operates a shop called Green Cup at Star Avenue 3 Viva Terrace, Mahidol Road.
streetAddress: Star Avenue 3, Viva Terrace Lifestyle Mall
